title: if i am under level 30...the only choice for me is co-op vs idiot ai????!!!!!!!
body:
I know how to play this game well, though I am only level 11....
but I wanna try pvp, because ai is so dumb.
when I make normal match it takes me fucking half an hour??????
r u fucking kidding me ???? ???? fucking shit... I have paid a lot for this game but why is the user experience so fucking terrible???
can u just let me make pvp games without so long waiting????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????

replies.body: You payed for this game? How? Why?
You should be able to queue up for blind pick PvP games at level 11. Can you [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing?

You think you can play, but if you are only lvl 11, I assure you.. you are terrible. Even when you reach lvl 30, you will be terrible.

They prevent you from playing with other lvl 30 players, because you would make the experience bad for them.

Use this time wisely. Learn to rolfstomp bots. You should go 20/4 in bot games. Once you are doing that on 3-5 champs, if you are still not lvl 30, buy a boost.
That seems like a very long time. I remember my queue times being much shorter at the lower ELO's. In gold/plat my wait times get as high as 12 minutes sometimes.

Hey, i'm just your friendly Bronze player but get used to it. And also you can play pvp at lv 6. No need to get hasty now i was once like you but i realized with league that's its not about being the best player but to be patient cause good things come to people who wait :)
